Bash(GH_TOKEN=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 gh pr create --title "Add promptfoo regression test suite for 8 MCP tools" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add a **promptfoo-based regression test suite** with 34 test cases for all 8 MCP tools
- Tests run against the HTTP transport \(`POST /mcp/tools/call`\) and validate response structure, types, and consistency
- Custom Python provider bridges promptfoo â†’ MCP HTTP API

## What''s included

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `tests/regression/promptfooconfig.yaml` | 34 test cases across 8 tools + error/perf tests |
| `tests/regression/mcp_provider.py` | Custom provider calling `/mcp/tools/call` |
| `tests/regression/README.md` | Setup and usage docs |

## Test coverage

| Tool | Tests |
|------|-------|
| `check_tag_compliance` | 4 \(score range, violations, severity filter, multi-region\) |
| `find_untagged_resources` | 4 \(resource list, costs, structure, region filter\) |
| `validate_resource_tags` | 3 \(ARN validation, structure, count consistency\) |
| `get_cost_attribution_gap` | 3 \(spend fields, group_by, math consistency\) |
| `suggest_tags` | 2 \(suggestion structure, confidence scores\) |
| `get_tagging_policy` | 4 \(policy shape, known tags, idempotency\) |
| `generate_compliance_report` | 4 \(JSON/MD/CSV formats, recommendations\) |
| `get_violation_history` | 4 \(data points, day/week/month grouping\) |
| Error handling | 4 \(invalid tool, params, edge cases\) |
| Performance | 2 \(latency for local-only tools\) |

## How to run

```bash
python run_server.py                  # Start MCP server
cd tests/regression && npx promptfoo@latest eval  # Run tests
npx promptfoo@latest view             # View results in browser
```

## Test plan
- [x] YAML config parses correctly \(34 tests counted\)
- [x] Python provider loads and `call_api` function works
- [x] Dry-run returns expected connection error when server is down
- [ ] Full run against live server \(deferred â€” run when ready\)
